item.description:
Hi everyone!!  I hope everyone made it safely through all those storms.  Spring is just around the corner.

We'll have our March Meet Up on Sunday the 6th from 11am-1pm.  For those of you who have not attended before, please be sure to check in at the front desk and bring proof of vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know so I can be sure to have a groomer available.

Looking forward to seeing you all.  Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
item.name: MARCH MEET UP
